did.unittitle: James H. Fanning whaling voyage and genealogy journal
did.abstract: One journal kept by James H. Fanning (b. 1833) of the town of Southampton, Long Island, N.Y., documenting a whaling voyage in the Sandwich Islands (Hawaii) from 1860 to 1862 as well as a record of Fanning family births, marriages, and deaths throughout the period 1806 to 1918.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One journal kept by James H. Fanning (b. 1833) of the town of Southampton, Long Island, N.Y., documenting a whaling voyage in the Sandwich Islands (Hawaii) from 1860 to 1862 aboard the bark Ontario of New Bedford, MA. The journal also includes a Fanning family record of births, marriages, and deaths throughout the period 1806 to 1918. The volume is covered with red cotton cloth and is hand sewn.
